name: Mixcraft 8 Project
summary: Learn about .MX8 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Mixcraft is a digital audio workstation (DAW) available for Windows. Acoustica released Mixcraft 8 in May 2017. This version of Mixcraft saves users' music and music video projects as MX8 files.

An MX8 file may contain an audio project and/or a music video project. Music video projects also include an imported video and effects applied to that video. After finalizing a project, users can export the music they've created as .MP3, .OGG, or .WAV files. They can export finalized music videos as .AVI or .WMV files.

description: An MX8 file is an audio project created by Acoustica Mixcraft 8. It contains a song that is comprised of one or more audio tracks. It also contains a record of the imported audio, loops, and virtual instruments used in the project.

instructions: You can open an MX8 file with Acoustica Mixcraft 8 (Windows) and later versions. If you open an MX8 file with a later version of Mixcraft, you will have to save the file in that version's project file format. For example, if you open an MX8 file in Mixcraft 9 and attempt to save it, you will have to save it as an .MX9 file.
